<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dispelling Sliver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=205)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 566 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 2,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** Your Strike damages a target

**Requirement** You're a master with the affixed weapon
</row>

</column>

---

Made from a treated sliver of cold iron, this talisman allows you to counteract magical effects. When you activate the _dispelling sliver_, it attempts to counteract a single spell active on the target, with the effects of an 8th-level [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) spell (counteract modifier +29)

 If you activate the talisman on a successful [Dispelling Slice](/Feats.aspx?ID=594), the talisman attempts to counteract all spells active on the target.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

requirement: You're a master with the affixed weapon
